name: 15 Seconds (itch) (Chase_Exists)
description:
IMPORTANT: game MUST be played in full screen!

Very short and kinda hard game for Lejynn Game Jam. The idea is that you have 15 seconds before you self-destruct, but there is a pool of water somewhere on the level, so you have to get there in time without hitting a spike or cannonball. This is also my first game ever that I have finished and released so it's probably not the best but I hope you still enjoy it! :)
